Sentencas: The novel h-BN/glass compressive seals were investigated for use in solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Thermal cycling stability of novel hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN)/glass compressive seals for planar intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The glass was mixed with h-BN powders to obtain composite materials using tape casting technique.
Titulo: Thermal cycling stability of novel hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN)/glass compressive seals for planar intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Leakage rates were measured below 0.012 sccm/cm under input gas pressure of 6.8 kPa.
Titulo: Thermal cycling stability of novel hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN)/glass compressive seals for planar intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Seals containing 40% by weight glass showed excellent thermal cycle and long-term operation stability.
Titulo: Thermal cycling stability of novel hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN)/glass compressive seals for planar intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The leakage rates were reduced by more than half after ten thermal cycles under different input gas pressure.
Titulo: Thermal cycling stability of novel hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN)/glass compressive seals for planar intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Also, the leakage rates gradually decreased to 0.008 sccm/cm under input gas pressure of 20.4 kPa at 750 degrees C during 208 h, and then remained stable.
Titulo: Thermal cycling stability of novel hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN)/glass compressive seals for planar intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These observations can be explained by liquid B2O3 films having gradually formed on the h-BN surface.
Titulo: Thermal cycling stability of novel hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN)/glass compressive seals for planar intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Boron oxidation effectively improved bondage for both interface and interior particles.
Titulo: Thermal cycling stability of novel hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN)/glass compressive seals for planar intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This phenomenon was interpreted by seals' microstructure analyses and transmission electron microscopy.
Titulo: Thermal cycling stability of novel hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN)/glass compressive seals for planar intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Finally, an evolution model is proposed to explain the process.
Titulo: Thermal cycling stability of novel hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN)/glass compressive seals for planar intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
